body_html: @iganichev This may be pretty straightforward, but when an op has a func-valued attribute (such as the MapDataset op), how should I set that attribute using the C API? Are we currently missing a SetAttrFunc method or is there another way? Thanks! :)
body_text: @iganichev This may be pretty straightforward, but when an op has a func-valued attribute (such as the MapDataset op), how should I set that attribute using the C API? Are we currently missing a SetAttrFunc method or is there another way? Thanks! :)
body: @iganichev This may be pretty straightforward, but when an op has a `func`-valued attribute (such as the `MapDataset` op), how should I set that attribute using the C API? Are we currently missing a `SetAttrFunc` method or is there another way? Thanks! :)
